divs: sighting detailsi was outside around 4 to 430 a.m. on 7\11\11. i am new to writing this stuff down so i am not quite sure of the exact time. i went out for a cigar. i looked up in the sky directly above me and noticed a very faint yellowish light high in the sky. i was really studying it because i was in the air force and have a base near by and this light did not seem to be any plane i had been familiar with. it was going faster than i thought it should. it was really high so i was also trying to tell if i could see if this yellowish white orb light was pulsating like a strobe light or if there was a red and green light near for the wings. there was not. then the light vanished completely and suddenly while i was watching it. now there was no clouds in the sky and i had visible stars in the vicinity of the disappearance. for reference i was staring at the northeast sky. then out of the corner of my eye to the east i see a flash and turn to see if i can see it clearly but it is not there. within 10 seconds a very bright light in a sort of orb shape lights up it jumps a short distance very fast and disappears. this orb like light is way bigger than the one i first saw but it is also lower in the sky. it also appears white whereas the first looked dim and yellow. i stayed outside for about 10 minutes then went inside and told my wife to come and watch with me. she thought i was crazy but went out for about 2 minutes. i stayed outside a good 45 minutes without anymore events. i went out last night too with out anything happening.
Summary: Watched a small dim orb light then two bright flash orbs.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cabot
There were no other sightings in Cabot on or around July 10th 2011
